description: Details required by Condition 26 (Secure Cycle Parking Facilities) of planning permission ref 19/01207/FUL (Alterations and extensions of existing student Seething Wells Campus to provide additional student accommodation and ancillary facilities. Rooftop extensions to existing buildings to provide 159 new student rooms, alterations to Listed Buildings to provide a caf√©, flexible meeting and recreation spaces and other ancillary facilities)
decision_conditions: Please revise a Validation Checklist with updated information. The new Validation Local List and checklists can be obtained via the council's website: https://www.kingston.gov.uk/downloads/download/261/validation-requirements-for-planning-applications
For the avoidance of doubt, the applicant is reminded that this application only pertains to the proposed roof extension.
